task.title: How to Sum-Up
task.shortdesc: Here you will find the instructions about the adding feature of the Calc App.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers, you must know what is addition.

example.p: You want to add 3 with 4. The equation will look like, 3+4=7. You will enter 3, click on the plus (+) sign, then enter 4 and click on equal (=) sign.
The result 7 will appear on screen.
